description: Number of 4-balanced strings of length n: let d(S)= #(1)'s in S - #(0)'s, then S is k-balanced if every substring T has -k<=d(T)<=k; here k=4.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,4,-3,-3).
formula: a_n = a_{n-1} + 4a_{n-2} - 3a_{n-3} - 3a_{n-4}.a_0 = 1; for n>0 odd, a_n = 7 * 3^floor{n/2} - F_{n+4}; for n>0 even, a_n = 4 * 3^floor{n/2} - F_{n+4} where F_n is the n-th Fibonacci number. - Barry Guiduli (guiduli(AT)gmail.com), Jun 23 2005G.f.
